name: Triple Tiles
description:
Triple Tiles is an addictive and challenging match-3 game. Faced with an endless stream of three-tile groups, you must place them on the board and create lines of 3 matching tiles. Every turn you take increases the amount of clutter on the board, forcing you to carefully consider your next move.

Warning

Your scores and settings won't be saved if you have third party cookies disabled in your browser.

The web version is not meant to be played on touchscreens. Try the iOS version.
